title: Biotin Hair & Nails Shot
subtitle: Strengthen hair & nails from within
description: A concentrated Vitamin B7 (Biotin) injection designed to support keratin infrastructure, promoting stronger, faster-growing nails and thicker, more resilient hair. Essential for those experiencing hair thinning or brittle nails due to nutritional deficiencies.
preparation: Consistency is key - weekly shots recommended for first month. Stay hydrated.
